titles.title: A resolution honoring the memory of the victims of the brutal and senseless attack at a country music festival in Las Vegas, Nevada, 1 year ago.
A resolution honoring the memory of the victims of the brutal and senseless attack at a country music festival in Las Vegas, Nevada, 1 year ago.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Commemorates the victims killed in the Route 91 Harvest festival attack in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Honors the survivors and pledges continued support for their recovery.
